errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that the `sympy` dependency is optional, when in fact it is a required dependency.
correction_candidates: Change the text to 'This package only depends on ``numpy`` and ``sympy``.'
Change the text to 'This package depends on ``numpy`` and optionally on ``sympy`` for advanced features.'
Add installation instructions for optional dependencies: `pip install unyt[sympy]`
Change the text to 'This package has no external dependencies.'
errors.golden_answer: Change the text to 'This package only depends on ``numpy`` and ``sympy``.'
